title: Firebase Hosting
description: The Firebase Hosting REST API enables programmatic and customizable deployments to your Firebase-hosted sites. Use this REST API to deploy new or updated hosting configurations and content files.

firebasehosting_sites_domains_delete.title: Deletes the existing domain mapping on the specified site.
firebasehosting_sites_domains_delete.description: Deletes the existing domain mapping on the specified site.

firebasehosting_sites_domains_get.title: Gets a domain mapping on the specified site.
firebasehosting_sites_domains_get.description: Gets a domain mapping on the specified site.

firebasehosting_sites_versions_patch.title:
Updates the specified metadata for a version. Note that this method will
fail with `FAILED_PRECONDITION` in the event of an invalid state
transition. The only valid transition for a version is currently from a
`CREATED` status to a `FINALIZED` status.
Use [`DeleteVersion`](../sites.versions/delete) to set the status of a
version to `DELETED`.
firebasehosting_sites_versions_patch.description:
Updates the specified metadata for a version. Note that this method will
fail with `FAILED_PRECONDITION` in the event of an invalid state
transition. The only valid transition for a version is currently from a
`CREATED` status to a `FINALIZED` status.
Use [`DeleteVersion`](../sites.versions/delete) to set the status of a
version to `DELETED`.

firebasehosting_sites_domains_update.title:
Updates the specified domain mapping, creating the mapping as if it does
not exist.
firebasehosting_sites_domains_update.description:
Updates the specified domain mapping, creating the mapping as if it does
not exist.

firebasehosting_sites_domains_list.title: Lists the domains for the specified site.
firebasehosting_sites_domains_list.description: Lists the domains for the specified site.

firebasehosting_sites_domains_create.title: Creates a domain mapping on the specified site.
firebasehosting_sites_domains_create.description: Creates a domain mapping on the specified site.

firebasehosting_sites_versions_files_lis.title: Lists the remaining files to be uploaded for the specified version.
firebasehosting_sites_versions_files_lis.description: Lists the remaining files to be uploaded for the specified version.

firebasehosting_sites_releases_list.title: Lists the releases that have been created on the specified site.
firebasehosting_sites_releases_list.description: Lists the releases that have been created on the specified site.

firebasehosting_sites_releases_create.title:
Creates a new release which makes the content of the specified version
actively display on the site.
firebasehosting_sites_releases_create.description:
Creates a new release which makes the content of the specified version
actively display on the site.

firebasehosting_sites_versions_create.title: Creates a new version for a site.
firebasehosting_sites_versions_create.description: Creates a new version for a site.

firebasehosting_sites_versions_populateF.title: Adds content files to a version.
firebasehosting_sites_versions_populateF.description: Adds content files to a version.
